author: Yong Pung How CJ:
casename: Selvarajoo s/o Malayappan Krishsamy v Public Prosecutor
counsel: M Ravi (M Ravi and Co) for petitioner; Amarjit Singh (Deputy Public Prosecutor) for respondent
tags: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Revision of proceedings
tags-parsed: Criminal Procedure and Sentencing/Revision of proceedings/Adducing fresh evidence at criminal revision/Whether procedure to adduce fresh evidence adhered to/Power of court to allow adduction of fresh evidence despite failure to adhere to appropriate procedure/Whether petitioner satisfied the three conditions when seeking to adduce fresh evidence
